Home.title: SukeGene
Home.mainTitle: Unite your plans, simplify your life.
Home.description: Combine multiple events into one calendar file.
Home.keywords: calendar, schedule generator, ics, event export, ics download, ics export, SukeGene

Tutorial.slide1: SukeGene lets you create events and export them as an .ics file.
Tutorial.slide2: Enter the date and click the Add button.
Tutorial.slide3: Click the Download button to add all events to your calendar at once!
